meanings.definition: A person who selects and extracts passages from a larger work for publication or quotation.
meanings.sent1: The excerpter chose the most interesting parts of the book to include in the article.
meanings.sent2: The excerpter carefully picked out quotes from the novel to share with the readers.
meanings.sent3: The excerpter accidentally included a funny out-of-context sentence in the collection.
meanings.sent4: She was like an excerpter of memories, selecting only the most vivid moments to share.
meanings.sent5: The excerpter's job is to make the text more engaging by highlighting key points.
